trans-unit.source: Video descriptions are truncated by default and require manual action to expand them.

trans-unit.source: This video contains mature or explicit content

trans-unit.source: Some instances do not list videos containing mature or explicit content by default.
trans-unit.target: Cha chuir a h-uile ionstans videothan air a liosta sa bheil susbaint a tha iomchaidh do dh’inbhich a-mhàin.

trans-unit.source: Wait transcoding before publishing the video
trans-unit.target: Fuirich air an tar-chòdachadh mus fhoillsich thu a’ video

trans-unit.source: If you decide not to wait for transcoding before publishing the video, it could be unplayable until transcoding ends.

trans-unit.source: You can import any URL supported by youtube-dl or URL that points to a raw MP4 file. You should make sure you have diffusion rights over the content it points to, otherwise it could cause legal trouble to yourself and your instance.

Bu chòir dhut dèanamh cinnteach gu bheil còir sgaoilidh agad air an t-susbaint ris an tomh e ach nach èirich trioblaid a thaobh an lagha dhut fhèin no dhan ionstans agad.
Tha sinn duilich ach chaidh rudeigin ceàrr

trans-unit.source: Congratulations, the video behind will be imported! You can already add information about this video.

trans-unit.source: Congratulations! Your video is now available in your private library.

clàraich a-steach a chur do bheachd ris

trans-unit.source: Otherwise you can comment using an account on any ActivityPub-compatible instance. On most platforms, you can find the video by typing its URL in the search bar and then comment it from within the software's interface.

Air a’ mhòr-chuid a dh’ùrlaran, gheibh thu lorg air a’ video ’s tu a’ cur an URL aige sa bhàr-luirg agus ’s urrainn dhut do bheachd a chur ris am broinn eadar-aghaidh a’ bhathair-bhog an uairsin.

trans-unit.source: Transcoding is enabled on server. The video quota only take in account original video. At most, this user could use ~ .

Moreover, the NSFW checkbox on video upload will be automatically checked by default.

A bharrachd air sin, nochdaidh cromag o thùs ann am bogsa na susbainte do dh’inbhich a-mhàin nuair a luchdaicheas cuideigin video suas.
Videothan air an cur ris o chionn goirid

trans-unit.source: Indicates the Twitter account for the website or platform on which the content was published.

Tha an t-ionstans air geal-liosta Twitter

trans-unit.source:
If your instance is whitelisted by Twitter, a video player will be embedded in the Twitter feed on PeerTube video share.
If the instance is not whitelisted, we use an image link card that will redirect on your PeerTube instance.

Check this checkbox, save the configuration and test with a video URL of your instance (https://example.com/videos/watch/blabla) on https://cards-dev.twitter.com/validator to see if you instance is whitelisted.
trans-unit.target:
If your instance is whitelisted by Twitter, a video player will be embedded in the Twitter feed on PeerTube video share.
If the instance is not whitelisted, we use an image link card that will redirect on your PeerTube instance.

Check this checkbox, save the configuration and test with a video URL of your instance (https://example.com/videos/watch/blabla) on https://cards-dev.twitter.com/validator to see if you instance is whitelisted.

trans-unit.source: If you disable transcoding, many videos from your users will not work!
trans-unit.target: Ma chuireas tu an tar-chòdachadh à comas, feumaidh gum bi mòran videothan aig na cleachdaichean agad nach obraich!

trans-unit.source: Allow your users to upload .mkv, .mov, .avi, .flv videos
trans-unit.target: Ceadaich gun luchdaidh na cleachdaichean agad suas videothan .mkv, .mov, .avi, .flv

trans-unit.source: Some files are not federated (previews, captions). We fetch them directly from the origin instance and cache them.
trans-unit.target: Cha dèid a h-uile faidhle fheadaralachadh (ro-sheallaidhean, fo-thiotalan). Gheibh sinn iad gu dìreach on ionstans tùsail ’s cuiridh sinn san tasgadan iad.

trans-unit.source:
Write directly JavaScript code.
Example: 
console.log('my instance is amazing');
trans-unit.target:

trans-unit.source:
Write directly CSS code. Example:

  #custom-css 
    color: red;
Prepend with #custom-css to override styles. Example:

  #custom-css .logged-in-email 
    color: red;
It seems the configuration is invalid. Please search potential errors in the different tabs.

trans-unit.target: Poileasaidh tùsail air videothan sa bheil susbaint phrìobhaideach

trans-unit.target: Nuair a bhios tu air an cunntas agad a sguabadh às, chan fhaigh thu air ais e idir. Bidh cinnteach às.

trans-unit.source: You don't have any subscriptions yet.
trans-unit.target: Cha d’ fhuair thu fo-sgrìobhadh fhathast.
Tadhail air duilleag cunntas an t-sealbhadair

trans-unit.source: You don't have videos history yet.
trans-unit.target: Chan eil eachdraidh videothan agad thathast.
Comharraich gun deach na h-uile a leughadh
Chan eil video air an liosta-chluich seo.
Iarr post-d airson dearbhadh a’ chunntais

trans-unit.source: This instance does not require email verification.
trans-unit.target: Chan iarr an t-ionstans seo dearbhadh air a’ phost-d.
Air a mhùchadh leis an ionstans agad
Chaidh an ionstans a mhùchadh leis an ionstans agad
Cuir taic ris an t-seanail seo

trans-unit.source: This channel does not have playlists.
trans-unit.target: Chan eil liosta-chluich aig an t-seanail seo.

trans-unit.source: PeerTube is a federated (ActivityPub) video streaming platform using P2P (WebTorrent) directly in the web browser.
trans-unit.target: ’S e ùrlar sruthaidh video feadaralaichte (ActivityPub) ’s a chleachdas P2P (WebTorrent) sa bhrabhsair-lìn fhèin a th’ ann am PeerTube.

trans-unit.source: It is a free and open-source software, under the AGPLv3 licence.
For more information, please visit joinpeertube.org.
PeerTube uses the BitTorrent protocol to share bandwidth between users. This implies that your IP address is stored in the instance's BitTorrent tracker as long as you download or watch the video.
In theory, someone with enough technical skills could create a script that tracks which IP is downloading which video. In practice, this is much more difficult because:
An HTTP request has to be sent on each tracker for each video to spy. If we want to spy all PeerTube's videos, we have to send as many requests as there are videos (so potentially a lot)

For each request sent, the tracker returns random peers at a limited number. For instance, if there are 1000 peers in the swarm and the tracker sends only 20 peers for each request, there must be at least 50 requests sent to know every peers in the swarm
Those requests have to be sent regularly to know who starts/stops watching a video. It is easy to detect that kind of behaviour
If an IP address is stored in the tracker, it doesn't mean that the person behind the IP (if this person exists) has watched the video
The IP address is a vague information : usually, it regularly changes and can represent many persons or entities

Web peers are not publicly accessible: because we use WebRTC inside the web browser (with the WebTorrent library), the protocol is different from classic BitTorrent. When you are in a web browser, you send a signal containing your IP address to the tracker that will randomly choose other peers to forward the information to. See this document for more information
The worst-case scenario of an average person spying on their friends is quite unlikely. There are much more effective ways to get that kind of information.
How does PeerTube compare with YouTube?
trans-unit.target: How does PeerTube compare with YouTube?

trans-unit.source: The threats to privacy in YouTube are different from PeerTube's. In YouTube's case, the platform gathers a huge amount of your personal information (not only your IP) to analyze them and track you. Moreover, YouTube is owned by Google/Alphabet, a company that tracks you across many websites (via AdSense or Google Analytics).
What can I do to limit the exposure of my IP address?
trans-unit.target: What can I do to limit the exposure of my IP address?

trans-unit.source: Your IP address is public so every time you consult a website, there is a number of actors (in addition to the final website) seeing your IP in their connection logs: ISP/routers/trackers/CDN and more. PeerTube is transparent about it: we warn you that if you want to keep your IP private, you must use a VPN or Tor Browser. Thinking that removing P2P from PeerTube will give you back anonymity doesn't make sense.
What will be done to mitigate this problem?
trans-unit.target: What will be done to mitigate this problem?

trans-unit.source: PeerTube is in its early stages, and want to deliver the best countermeasures possible by the time the stable is released. In the meantime, we want to test different ideas related to this issue:
Set a limit to the number of peers sent by the tracker
trans-unit.target: Set a limit to the number of peers sent by the tracker

trans-unit.source: Set a limit on the request frequency received by the tracker (being tested)
trans-unit.target: Set a limit on the request frequency received by the tracker (being tested)

trans-unit.source: Ring a bell if there are unusual requests (being tested)
trans-unit.target: Ring a bell if there are unusual requests (being tested)

trans-unit.source: Disable P2P from the administration interface
trans-unit.target: Disable P2P from the administration interface

trans-unit.source: An automatic video redundancy program: we wouldn't know if the IP downloaded the video on purpose or if it was the automatized program
trans-unit.target: An automatic video redundancy program: we wouldn't know if the IP downloaded the video on purpose or if it was the automatized program

trans-unit.source: I am at least 16 years old and agree to the Terms of this instance
trans-unit.target: Tha mi 16 bliadhna a dh’aois no nas sine agus gabhaidh mi ri teirmichean an ionstans seo

trans-unit.source: Do you really want to delete ?

trans-unit.target: You are now logged in as !

Cuir am fòcas air a’ bhàr-luirg

trans-unit.source: Go to the videos overview page
trans-unit.target: Tadhail air duilleag foir-shealladh nam videothan

Cha b’ urrainn dhuinn an teisteas cliant OAuth fhaighinn: .

trans-unit.source: Ensure you have correctly configured PeerTube (config/ directory), in particular the "webserver" section.
trans-unit.target: Dèan cinnteach gun do rèitich thu PeerTube mar bu chòir (sa phasgan config/) ’s gu sònraichte an earrann "webserver".
Chan eil an t-ainm-cleachdaiche no chan eil am facal-faire mar bu chòir.
Chaidh an cunntas agad a bhacadh.

trans-unit.source: An email with the reset password instructions will be sent to .
trans-unit.target: Thèid post-d le stiùireadh air ath-shuidheachadh an fhacail-fhaire a chur gu .

trans-unit.source: Your password has been successfully reset!
Short description should not be longer than 250 characters.
trans-unit.target: Cha bu chòir dhan tuairisgeul ghoirid a bhith nas fhaide na 250 caractar.
Tha meud tasgadan nan ro-sheallaidhean riatanach.

trans-unit.source: Previews cache size must be greater than 1.
trans-unit.target: Feumaidh meud tasgadan nan ro-sheallaidhean a bhith nas motha na 1.

trans-unit.source: Previews cache size must be a number.
trans-unit.target: Feumaidh meud tasgadan nan ro-sheallaidhean a bhith ’na àireamh.
Tha meud tasgadan nam fo-thiotalan video riatanach.

trans-unit.source: Captions cache size must be greater than 1.
trans-unit.target: Feumaidh meud tasgadan nam fo-thiotalan video a bhith nas motha na 1.

trans-unit.source: Captions cache size must be a number.
trans-unit.target: Feumaidh meud tasgadan nam fo-thiotalan video a bhith ’na àireamh.

trans-unit.source: Signup limit must be greater than 1.
trans-unit.target: Feumaidh crìoch clàraidh a bhith nas motha na 1.

trans-unit.source: Signup limit must be a number.
trans-unit.target: Feumaidh crìoch clàraidh a bhith ’na àireamh.
Feumaidh post-d an rianaire a bhith dligheach.

trans-unit.source: Transcoding threads must be greater or equal to 0.
trans-unit.target: Chan fhaod snàithleanan tar-chòdachaidh a bhith nas lugha na 0.
Feumaidh am post-d a bhith dligheach.

trans-unit.source: Your name must be at least 1 character long.
trans-unit.target: Feumaidh d’ ainm a bhith 1 charactar a dh’fhaid air a char as lugha.

trans-unit.source: Your name cannot be more than 120 characters long.
trans-unit.target: Chan fhaod d’ ainm a bhith nas fhaide na 120 caractar.

trans-unit.source: The message must be at least 3 characters long.
trans-unit.target: Feumaich an teachdaireachd a bhith 3 caractaran a dh'fhaid air a char as lugha.

trans-unit.source: The message cannot be more than 5000 characters long.
trans-unit.target: Chan fhaod an teachdaireachd a bhith nas fhaide na 5000 caractar.

trans-unit.source: Confirmation of the password is required.
Username must be at least 1 character long.
trans-unit.target: Feumaidh an t-ainm-cleachdaiche a bhith 1 charactar a dh’fhaid air a char as giorra.

trans-unit.source: Username cannot be more than 50 characters long.
trans-unit.target: Chan fhaod ainm-cleachdaiche a bhith nas fhaide na 50 caractar.

trans-unit.source: Username should be lowercase alphanumeric; dots and underscores are allowed.
trans-unit.target: Username should be lowercase alphanumeric; dots and underscores are allowed.

trans-unit.source: Password must be at least 6 characters long.
trans-unit.target: Password must be at least 6 characters long.

trans-unit.source: Password cannot be more than 255 characters long.
trans-unit.target: Password cannot be more than 255 characters long.

trans-unit.source: The new password and the confirmed password do not correspond.
trans-unit.target: The new password and the confirmed password do not correspond.

trans-unit.source: Daily upload limit must be greater than -1.
trans-unit.target: Daily upload limit must be greater than -1.

trans-unit.source: Description must be at least 3 characters long.
trans-unit.target: Description must be at least 3 characters long.

trans-unit.source: Description cannot be more than 1000 characters long.
trans-unit.target: Description cannot be more than 1000 characters long.

trans-unit.source: You must to agree with the instance terms in order to registering on it.
trans-unit.target: You must to agree with the instance terms in order to registering on it.

trans-unit.source: Ban reason must be at least 3 characters long.
trans-unit.target: Ban reason must be at least 3 characters long.

trans-unit.source: Ban reason cannot be more than 250 characters long.
trans-unit.target: Ban reason cannot be more than 250 characters long.

trans-unit.source: Display name must be at least 1 character long.
trans-unit.target: Display name must be at least 1 character long.

trans-unit.source: Display name cannot be more than 50 characters long.
trans-unit.target: Display name cannot be more than 50 characters long.

trans-unit.source: Report reason must be at least 2 characters long.
trans-unit.target: Report reason must be at least 2 characters long.

trans-unit.source: Report reason cannot be more than 3000 characters long.
trans-unit.target: Report reason cannot be more than 3000 characters long.

trans-unit.source: Moderation comment must be at least 2 characters long.
trans-unit.target: Moderation comment must be at least 2 characters long.

trans-unit.source: Moderation comment cannot be more than 3000 characters long.
trans-unit.target: Moderation comment cannot be more than 3000 characters long.

trans-unit.source: Blacklist reason must be at least 2 characters long.
trans-unit.target: Feumaidh adhbhar na dubh-liosta a bhith 2 charactar a dh’fhaid air a char as lugha.

trans-unit.source: Blacklist reason cannot be more than 300 characters long.
trans-unit.target: Chan fhaod adhbhar na dubh-liosta a bhith nas fhaide na 300 caractar.
Tha feum air cànan fo-thiotalan a’ video.
Tha feum air faidhle fo-thiotalan a’ video.

trans-unit.source: You can only transfer ownership to a local account
trans-unit.target: Chan urrainn dhut an t-sealbh atharrachadh ach gu cunntas ionadail

trans-unit.source: Name must be at least 1 character long.
trans-unit.target: Name must be at least 1 character long.

trans-unit.source: Name cannot be more than 50 characters long.
trans-unit.target: Name cannot be more than 50 characters long.

trans-unit.source: Name should be lowercase alphanumeric; dots and underscores are allowed.
trans-unit.target: Name should be lowercase alphanumeric; dots and underscores are allowed.

trans-unit.source: Support text must be at least 3 characters long.
trans-unit.target: Support text must be at least 3 characters long.

trans-unit.source: Support text cannot be more than 1000 characters long.
trans-unit.target: Support text cannot be more than 1000 characters long.

trans-unit.source: Comment must be at least 2 characters long.
trans-unit.target: Comment must be at least 2 characters long.

trans-unit.source: Comment cannot be more than 3000 characters long.
trans-unit.target: Comment cannot be more than 3000 characters long.

trans-unit.source: Display name cannot be more than 120 characters long.
trans-unit.target: Display name cannot be more than 120 characters long.

trans-unit.source: The channel is required when the playlist is public.
trans-unit.target: The channel is required when the playlist is public.

trans-unit.source: Video name must be at least 3 characters long.
trans-unit.target: Video name must be at least 3 characters long.

trans-unit.source: Video name cannot be more than 120 characters long.
trans-unit.target: Video name cannot be more than 120 characters long.

trans-unit.source: Video description must be at least 3 characters long.
trans-unit.target: Video description must be at least 3 characters long.

trans-unit.source: Video description cannot be more than 10000 characters long.
trans-unit.target: Video description cannot be more than 10000 characters long.

trans-unit.source: A tag should be more than 2 characters long.
trans-unit.target: A tag should be more than 2 characters long.

trans-unit.source: A tag should be less than 30 characters long.
trans-unit.target: A tag should be less than 30 characters long.

trans-unit.source: Video support must be at least 3 characters long.
trans-unit.target: Video support must be at least 3 characters long.

trans-unit.source: Video support cannot be more than 1000 characters long.
trans-unit.target: Video support cannot be more than 1000 characters long.

trans-unit.source: A date is required to schedule video update.
trans-unit.target: A date is required to schedule video update.

trans-unit.target: Too many attempts, please try again after minutes.
